column4: I have a audio cd (legal) and I wanna rip it into MP3, what program can I use best to do so?
there is no best, if there were the other projects would cease as noboy would use anything else
there is no best anything ever, even ife is not best for some people
but isnt that a bit dirty for something I want to be unset by default?
there is no best app for anything
your right ;-) any application you recommend? :p
there are options and preferences and abilities, none are outright best. Each one may excel in a different way
won't it play the files as they are?
usually mkv. it has to be MP4 (with AAC audio) like ZykoticK9 said
wow that's pretty poor, thought the ipad was meant to be amazing...
i hoped it would support more formats too
more rasons for folks not to buy one "by the way we don't support too many formats cos we're dumb so you'll need to convert ALL you stuff to fit around the lack of features"
i can live with it, but it would have been nice if it did support more formats indeed
